titleStmt.title: Reasons humbly offered to this honourable House why a bill pretended to give further powers to the corporation for setting the poor of the city of London and liberties thereof to work should not pass into a law

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.).
Endorsed: Reasons for making the ward of Farringdon Without in London a corporation to imploy their poor and erect workhouses ...
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
